'''Max Keiser''' is an American broadcaster and entrepreneur who has become known for his advocacy of cryptocurrency, particularly Bitcoin. He has been a regular guest on the InfoWars program, where he has promoted Bitcoin as a solution to many of the world's financial problems.

Keiser often uses his InfoWars apperances to shill for Bitcoin and a promote other risky investments. It is worth noting Keiser has a financial interest in promoting Bitcoin, as he owns a number of Bitcoin-related companies.
